messages.subject: Interest in 2025 Mazda
messages.body:
Hi Christina,

Thank you for reaching out! The 2025 Mazda offers an exceptional blend of performance and style, ensuring a thrilling driving experience while keeping you comfortable and safe. Plus, at Tustin Mazda, we pride ourselves on our No Addendums or Dealer Markups, making your purchase straightforward and transparent.

We’re here to help you with any questions you may have or to discuss specific features you’re interested in. Whether it’s a particular trim, color, or any other details, feel free to share your preferences!

Manny Zecena will be your dedicated salesperson, ready to assist you every step of the way. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Please let us know a convenient time for you, or you can instantly reserve your time here: <{LegacySalesApptSchLink}>


Patti
Tustin Mazda
28 Auto Center Dr, Tustin, CA 92782

messages.subject: Re: Interest in 2025 Mazda
messages.body: is there one with a blue color?

messages.subject: Re: Interest in 2025 Mazda
messages.body:
Hi Christina,

Great question! We do have options for the 2025 Mazda in blue. The specific availability can vary, so I recommend visiting us to see the selection in person. This way, you can also take a test drive and experience the vehicle firsthand.

When would you like to come in? Manny Zecena is ready to assist you and can help you explore all the features that interest you. You can also reserve your time instantly here: Schedule Your Visit.

Looking forward to helping you find the perfect Mazda!

Best,
Patti
messages.notes: Customer is interested in a blue 2025 Mazda and may want to schedule a visit.

messages.subject: Still interested in the blue 2025 Mazda?
messages.body:
Hi Christina,

I wanted to follow up and see if you’re still interested in the blue 2025 Mazda. We would love to help you find the perfect one! If you have any specific features or questions in mind, feel free to share.

Would you like me to check the current availability or assist you in scheduling a visit? Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best,
Patti
messages.notes: Following up on the customer's interest in a blue 2025 Mazda and offering to check availability or schedule a visit.
